text: The 2024–25 HMPV outbreak is an ongoing disease outbreak that began in northern parts of China on 16 December 2024.https://www.ndtv.com/health/new- virus-outbreak-in-china-what-is-hmpv-know-symptoms-prevention-tips-and- more-7389823 The HMPV cases spreading rapidly and was rise among the children in the ages of 14 according to the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention, there some respiratory illness percent hospitalizations in China, COVID-19, rhinovirus or adenovirus.https://globalnation.inquirer.net/260086/chinese-embassy-dismisses- rumors-of-new-disease-outbreak-in-china On 6 January 2025, India, Malaysia and Hong Kong had reported cases of HMPV. ==Cases in the territories== Location Cases Deaths Recoveries –– –– 327 –– 30 –– 10 –– 6 –– –– –– ==Related pages== *COVID-19 * COVID-19 pandemic ==References== Category:21st-century epidemics Category:2024 in Asia Category:2025 in Asia Category:December 2024 events Category:January 2025 events Category:February 2025 events
title: 2024–2025 China HMPV outbreak
